meanings: 문화예술 R. Strauss, Also sprach Zarathustra, Op.30

examples.korean: ‘Let go of me,’ she said fiercely. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “나를 놔 줘.” 그녀가 거칠게 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Let go of me,’ she said fiercely. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Stop it!’ he said through gritted teeth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그만 해!” 그가 이를 악물고 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Stop it!’ he said through gritted teeth. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The assassin said he had acted alone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 암살범은 자기 단독으로 범행을 했다고 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The assassin said he had acted alone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Get out of my sight!’ he boomed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “내 눈 앞에서 사라져!” 그가 우렁우렁한 목소리로 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Get out of my sight!’ he boomed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He spoke of us scornfully as raw recruits. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 우리를 햇병아리들이라고 비꼬듯 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He spoke of us scornfully as raw recruits. Add to Wordbook
